thread.title: Man ordered not to put Brexit numberplate on his car - so it's for sale

author: Daniel Clark
title: Man ordered not to put Brexit numberplate on his car - so it's for sale
text:
Get Daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Unsure what to get your Brexit-supporting friends and family for Christmas? Then you could be in luck as the ultimate Brexit car registration number is up for sale. 
The car registration number– X17 BRE – is being sold by Mark Hoyle from Torquay. 
He purchased the car registration number from the DVLA and holds the retention certificate for it, but says that if it goes on one of his cars, he has ‘been threatened with no Christmas dinner. Read More Devon Conservative MP Anne Marie Morris has whip restored after 'n r in the woodpile' comment The Unwanted Christmas present - X17 BRE - Uncherished registration number 
Mr Hoyle added: “Any monies raised over the original DVLA purchase price will go to a local homeless charity here in Torbay, looking to feed 100 plus individuals living on the streets in the English Riviera over the festive break. 
“Please feel free to donate even if you don't wish to purchase the ultimate BREXIT registration number and please share this with others. Read More
